html:
The spring has come
Beer flows in the pubs
Girls want to wear skirts
Sky shows a lot of promise
Waiting for people and papers
Bits flying all over the globe
Variables changing values
Trying to get it done
Writing to fullfill
Quitting smoking
It got really expensive
Wishing to smoke for ever
Not being oneself
Like a dark lord
Without his throne
On a pile of skulls
title: Smoking
